glsa.title: LibSSH: Information disclosure
glsa.synopsis: A vulnerability in LibSSH can result in leakage of private key information.

background.p: LibSSH is a C library providing SSHv2 and SSHv1.

description.p: A new connection inherits the state of the PRNG without re-seeding with random data.

impact.p: Servers using ECC (ECDSA) or DSA certificates in non-deterministic mode may under certain conditions leak their private key.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All LibSSH users should upgrade to the latest version:
